name: UIPageViewControllerDataSource
desc: The UIPageViewControllerDataSource protocol is adopted by an object that provides view controllers to the page view controller on an as-needed basis, in response to navigation gestures.

items.name: func pageViewController(UIPageViewController, viewControllerBefore: UIViewController) -> UIViewController?
items.desc: Returns the view controller before the given view controller.

items.name: func pageViewController(UIPageViewController, viewControllerAfter: UIViewController) -> UIViewController?
items.desc: Returns the view controller after the given view controller.

items.name: func presentationCount(for: UIPageViewController) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the number of items to be reflected in the page indicator.

items.name: func presentationIndex(for: UIPageViewController) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the selected item to be reflected in the page indicator.
